channel.title: Shops problem
channel.description:
Ok firstly, some shops don't work because I have added some different NPC's and when I remove them, the shops work good. So are the NPC's bugged? If they are is there any way I can add them but so that everything in my server still works?
MinimiGuard

item.title: Shops problem
item.dc:creator: @RS_CHamp2 RS CHamp2
item.description:
@RS_CHamp2 wrote:

Go through the tuts section and find out about “Adding shops in … source”
There will be some, cause i did that when i started making my server too…

Read full topic
